thread.title: Newquay Airport's £5 passenger fee to be discussed | West Country (W)
thread.title_full: Newquay Airport's £5 passenger fee to be discussed | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Newquay Airport's £5 passenger fee to be discussed | West Country (W)
text:
Newquay Airport Credit: ITV News A meeting will take place today to examine Cornwall Council's decision to scrap the £5 'airport development fee' charged to departing passengers.
The decision was made last week with the hope that it will help Newquay win back budget airline RyanAir.
The council has been criticised for making the decision in private.
Last updated Tue 22 Sep 2015 Read more 2 updates Newquay Airport scraps £5 passenger fee Travel Newquay Airport Cornwall and Isles of Scilly
